data.name: Pixel Gangsters
data.detailed_description:
• BUILD your mafia EMPIRE

• RECRUIT loyal mobsters and CREATE your gang

• UPGRADE your gangsters with WEAPONS and VEHICLES

• PLAN ROBBERIES, HEISTS and ASSASSINATIONS

• EXTORT businesses and collect PROTECTION fees

• BUY properties and manage illegal RACKETS

• INTERROGATE rival mobsters and SPY in their territories

• BRIBE city officials, such as the MAYOR and POLICE CHIEF

• BAIL yourself out of LAWSUITS

• ELIMINATE your RIVALS and take over the city

• RANDOMLY generated cities for limitless REPLAYABILITY

• RETRO PIXEL graphics (true 320x180 resolution)

data.short_description: Run your gang of mobsters and conquer the city in this indie mafia tycoon game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Pentium or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Organized Crime
References to violent crime (ex. assassination, bombing, etc.)
References to illegal activities (ex. prostitution, extortion, etc.)
References to Tobacco, Alcohol and Drugs
References to Gambling
